channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amtrak summer sale: 25% off Northeast travel
item.description: Following its general summer sale, Amtrak is now discounting fares for Northeast-based riders for travel through Labor Day. One-way routes start at $1...
